actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary, and Vocational Education

official_title: To amend the Act of September 30, 1950, to provide that certain lands administered by the National Forest Service shall be deemed to have fulfilled certain requirements relating to Federal acquisition of real property.

summary.text: Provides that any school district which, as demonstrated by written evidence from the National Forest Service or the Department of the Interior satisfactory to the Secretary of the Interior, contains land administered by the Service consisting of the Buffalo Gap, Fort Pierre, or Grand River National Grasslands, South Dakota, shall be deemed to have fulfilled certain requirements relating to Federal acquisition of real property.

titles.title: To amend the Act of September 30, 1950, to provide that certain lands administered by the National Forest Service shall be deemed to have fulfilled certain requirements relating to Federal acquisition of real property.
